headline.print_headline: Retired U.S. Navy Commander Pleads Guilty in Bribery Scandal
headline.main: Retired U.S. Navy Commander Pleads Guilty in Bribery Scandal

docs.snippet: A retired U.S. Navy commander pleaded guilty to federal conspiracy charges on Thursday in connection with a wide-ranging corruption investigation of a Singapore-based defense contractor....
docs.lead_paragraph: A retired U.S. Navy commander pleaded guilty to federal conspiracy charges on Thursday in connection with a wide-ranging corruption investigation of a Singapore-based defense contractor.

headline.print_headline: A Secret Retreat Morphs Into a Detox Unit

headline.main: A Secret Retreat Morphs Into a Detox Unit

docs.snippet: In Bernardo Bertolucci’s “Me and You,” a 14-year-old hides out in the basement until an older half sister disturbs his solitude....
docs.abstract: Stephen Holden reviews movie Me and You, directed by Bernardo Bertolucci; Jacopo Olmo Antinori and Tea Falco star.
docs.lead_paragraph: In Bernardo Bertolucci’s “Me and You,” a 14-year-old hides out in the basement until an older half sister disturbs his solitude.

headline.print_headline: Military Grounds All F-35 Jets During Fire Probe
headline.main: Military Grounds All F-35 Jets During Fire Probe

docs.snippet: U.S. military officials have grounded all F-35s while continuing to investigate a runway fire involving one of the fighter jets at Eglin Air Force Base in Florida....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. military officials have grounded all F-35s while continuing to investigate a runway fire involving one of the fighter jets at Eglin Air Force Base in Florida.

headline.print_headline: Peralta Has 4 RBIs, Diamondbacks Beat Pirates
headline.main: Peralta Has 4 RBIs, Diamondbacks Beat Pirates

docs.snippet: David Peralta had three hits, including a two-run homer, and drove in four runs as the Arizona Diamondbacks avoided a series sweep with a 10-2 victory over the Pittsburgh Pirates on Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: David Peralta had three hits, including a two-run homer, and drove in four runs as the Arizona Diamondbacks avoided a series sweep with a 10-2 victory over the Pittsburgh Pirates on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Intoxicated by a World She Is Struggling to Own

docs.snippet: “Gabrielle” centers on a woman with Williams syndrome who longs to gain independence and revel in her romance with a man who shares her disability....

docs.lead_paragraph: “Gabrielle” centers on a woman with Williams syndrome who longs to gain independence and revel in her romance with a man who shares her disability.

headline.print_headline: GM to Recall 27,051 Spark Cars in Korea Due to Transmission Defect
headline.main: GM to Recall 27,051 Spark Cars in Korea Due to Transmission Defect

docs.snippet: General Motors Co will recall 27,051 Spark mini cars in South Korea due to a defective transmission mount, the latest in a string of global recalls by the U.S. automaker....
docs.lead_paragraph: General Motors Co will recall 27,051 Spark mini cars in South Korea due to a defective transmission mount, the latest in a string of global recalls by the U.S. automaker.

headline.sub: Overpass collapses in World Cup host city
headline.main: Overpass collapses in World Cup host city
